title.rendered: 10 Signs You Have an Unhealthy Gut

content.rendered:
10 Signs You Have an Unhealthy Gut

10 Signs You Have an Unhealthy Gut

Learn more!

A leaky gut can cause serious health problems, and can keep you from losing weight.
 
Most people won’t realize they have a leaky gut until their health gets really bad.

Learn the warning signs so you can detect and fix leaky gut! 

Learn more

Stress, Anxiety and Depression

1

If your gut bacteria is out of balance, your intestines cannot release same feel-good neurotransmitters that are responsible for making you feel good.

Learn more

You Get Sick a Lot

2

An unhealthy gut can help the wrong bugs thrive and limit your body’s ability to use vitamins and nutrients properly

Learn more

Skin Problems

3

Your gut health affects inflammation throughout the body, which in turn affects the skin

Learn more

Stubborn Weight

4

If you have trouble losing weight no matter what you do, your unhealthy gut could be to blame.

Learn more

Autoimmune Disease

5

Poor gut health has been linked to autoimmune disease.

Learn more

Acid Reflux

6

Frequent, unrelenting acid reflux is often caused by an unhealthy gut.

Learn more

Yeast Infections

7

Yeast can grow out of control when your system is imbalanced.

Learn more

Lack of Energy

8

If you find it hard to dredge up any energy even when you’ve had enough sleep, you may have an unhealthy gut.

Learn more

High Cholesterol 

9

There are 34 microorganisms in the digestive tract that can influence the levels of fat in your blood.

Learn more

Asthma

10

If you have asthma, it might have been caused by the balance of bacteria that you had in your gut around the time of birth.

Learn more

Click the link below for more details on how you can build a Healthy Gut

Get More Details!

excerpt.rendered: Most people with a leaky gut don’t even know that their gut health is in distress until they try to lose weight and can’t no matter how hard they try! Learn the warning signs so you can detect it.

elements.content: A leaky gut can cause serious health problems, and can keep you from losing weight.   Most people won't realize they have a leaky gut until their health gets really bad. Learn the warning signs so you can detect and fix leaky gut!
If your gut bacteria is out of balance, your intestines cannot release same feel-good neurotransmitters that are responsible for making you feel good.
You Get Sick a Lot
An unhealthy gut can help the wrong bugs thrive and limit your body’s ability to use vitamins and nutrients properly
Your gut health affects inflammation throughout the body, which in turn affects the skin
If you have trouble losing weight no matter what you do, your unhealthy gut could be to blame.
Poor gut health has been linked to autoimmune disease.
Frequent, unrelenting acid reflux is often caused by an unhealthy gut.
Yeast can grow out of control when your system is imbalanced.
If you find it hard to dredge up any energy even when you’ve had enough sleep, you may have an unhealthy gut.
There are 34 microorganisms in the digestive tract that can influence the levels of fat in your blood.
If you have asthma, it might have been caused by the balance of bacteria that you had in your gut around the time of birth.
